sense.def:
A characteristic
je lastnost ali posebnost, ki je za nekoga ali nekaj značilna.

seg.quote: Ambition is a characteristic of all successful businessmen.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
characteristic of a person, thing, or place
, je značilno za neko osebo, stvar ali kraj.

seg.quote: ...those large brick tiles so characteristic of East Anglia.
He proposed a characteristically brilliant solution.
